confirm_policy: I confirm that I have read the Policy and Terms of Use

descriptions.confirmNotRobot: You have entered an incorrect username or password multiple times. Please confirm that you are not a robot.
descriptions.confirm_e-mail: confirm your email address using THIS DEVICE.
descriptions.e-mail_for_restoring: Enter an e-mail associated with your account and we will send instructions on how to restore your password.
descriptions.e-mail_for_restoring_username: Enter an e-mail associated with your account and we will send instructions on how to restore your username.
descriptions.instructions_sent: Instructions have been sent to your e-mail to restore your password.
descriptions.instructions_username_sent: Instructions have been sent to your e-mail to restore your username.
descriptions.password_instructions: Your new password must be different from previously used passwords.
descriptions.password_changed: Your password has been successfully changed.
descriptions.link_has_expired: Your email confirmation link has expired. Please click "Send Again" to receive a new confirmation email.
descriptions.if_not_receiving_email: If you are not receiving an email, contact us.

hints.username: In order to protect your identity now or in the future, we recommend not using your personal information when creating a username.
